Package Catalano.Statistics

The Catalano.Statistics namespace contains set of statistics utilities, which are used by other Catalano framework's namespaces or may be used individually.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContinuousHistogram
    Histogram for continuous random values.
    Correlations
    Used to compare two vectors in feature space by finding the similarity between the two.
    DataPreprocessing
    Data preprocessing describes any type of processing performed on raw data to prepare it for another processing procedure.
    DescriptiveStatistics
    Descriptive statistics are used to describe the basic features of the data in a study.
    Histogram
    Histogram for discrete random values.
    HistogramStatistics
    Set of histogram statistics functions.
    LinearRegression  
    Tools  

Package Catalano.Statistics Description

The Catalano.Statistics namespace contains set of statistics utilities, which are used by other Catalano framework's namespaces or may be used individually.
